short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows the users to download class rosters from the WPGA website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
For all WPGA website users, this extension allows you to download rosters as .csv files. To download a .csv file for all classes go to the main page (with all classes listed) while logged in and click the extension's icon in the extension bar (top right) of your chrome browser. To download a .csv file for one class, go to that classes page and click the extension icon as described before.


After doing this the class list/lists that you are looking for will be downloaded as .csv files. From here, they can be uploaded to google sheets, or opened with excel and saved as excel spreadsheets.
